bank

Class DataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • bank.DataBase

  • public final class DataBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to emulate a database.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public static User search(java.lang.String userName,
                          int password)
        Searches for the user userName in the database. If the password is wrong, or the user does not exist, then it returns null.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user's name
        password - the user's password
        Returns:
        the user (if found). null otherwise
